original_title: Pet of the Month: Mariwin Roberts
overview: Pet of the Month Mariwin Roberts is featured in this Hawaiian adventure. As she recounts for the office girls her recent adventure, the audience is treated to a visual and sexual tour-de-force. From hang gliding above the tropical cliffs to lovemaking on the lovely sands, beautiful Hawaii is seen in an entirely new light. This Pet proves to be the hottest thing to hit Hawaii since volcanoes. Aloha!
title: Pet of the Month: Mariwin Roberts
